issue_name: change "DS" or "DC" to "AU" if fraxinus.crown.thinning <= 5 and fraxinus.epicormic.growth>0
fix: idx_sp <- mort$sp_affected_by_eab ; idx_status <- grepl("DS|DC", mort$current_year_status) ; idx_crwnthng <- !is.na(mort$fraxinus_score_crown_living) & mort$fraxinus_score_crown_living <= 5 ; idx_epicgrwth <- !is.na(mort$fraxinus_epicormic_growth) & mort$fraxinus_epicormic_growth > 0; if(sum(idx_sp & idx_status & idx_crwnthng & idx_epicgrwth) > 0) mort[idx_sp & idx_status & idx_crwnthng & idx_epicgrwth,]$current_year_status <- "AU"
description_of_issue: if fraxinus or Chionanthus, fix change dead status from "DS" or "DC" to "AU" if fraxinus.crown.thinning ? 5 and fraxinus.epicormic.growth>0
